title: I Returned as a God - Novel Updates
tags: Dungeons   Former Hero   Gate to Another World   Godly Powers   Gods   Guilds   Handsome Male Lead   Hunters   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Returning from Another World   Special Abilities   Transmigration
author: Lee DaeHyuk   이대혁
description:
I was thrust into an unknown world by a god and forced to save it, under the promise that if I were successful in saving the world, I'd be sent back to my home...

However, after doing the god's bidding, I was betrayed. With no other options left, I had to escape through a dimensional rift.

'Just you wait! I’ll definitely come back!”

That's how I... Returned as a God. >
